name: Controlled useState
description: Appointment picker with date/time validation using controlled components with useState hook
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage form inputs (name, date, time) and validation states. Implements real-time validation against current time and creates ISO datetime strings for logging.
features: Text input for name with validation
Date input with minimum date restriction
Time input with dynamic minimum time
Console logging of appointment data in JSON format
Bootstrap card layout with success/error states
